attributes.title: CONSTANTLY DELETE THE PAST, CONSTANTLY UPGRADE YOURSELF! | SPECIAL SATSANGH |29 JULY 2021
attributes.description:
0:00:00 - DARSHAN
0:18:50 - SATSANGH
1:12:33 - INITIATION

29 JULY 2021, THURSDAY (IST) - ENGLISH AND TAMIL NITHYANANDA SATSANG GIST
10:15 PM - THE SPH DARSHAN
SHAKTI PADA AND SHAKTINI PADA WITH THE LIVE DARSHAN OF THE SUPREME PONTIFF OF HINDUISM (SPH), JAGATGURU MAHASANNIDHANAM (JGM), HIS DIVINE HOLINESS (HDH) BHAGAWAN NITHYANANDA PARAMASHIVAM.  
10:46 PM - 11:58 PM - NITHYANANDA SATSANG 
*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM KAILASA:
*CONSCIOUS SOVEREIGNTY NOT ONLY BRINGS YOU THE FREEDOM, IT BRINGS THE RIGHT PURPOSE FOR YOUR FREEDOM; NOT JUST HEALTH, BUT THE RIGHT REASON WHY YOU SHOULD BE HEALTHY; NOT JUST WEALTH, BUT THE RIGHT REASON WHY YOU SHOULD BE WEALTHY; NOT JUST FREEDOM, BUT THE RIGHT REASON - WHAT FOR AND WHAT KIND OF FREEDOM YOU NEED; NOT JUST POWERS, BUT WHAT KIND OF POWERS YOU NEED FOR YOUR FULFILMENT; NOT JUST BLISS, BUT BRINGING THE PURPOSE FOR YOUR EXISTENCE.
*THE BEAUTY OF CONSCIOUS SOVEREIGNTY IS, THE MOMENT YOU HEAR THIS TRUTH, GET INITIATED, YOUR INNER SPACE EXPANDS TO THAT LEVEL AND YOU CAN NEVER GO BACK TO THE OLD PAST SAME OLD PERSONALITY OR IDENTITY; ONCE IN A WAY YOU CAN HAVE MOOD SWINGS BUT YOU CAN NEVER GO BACK TO THE SAME PERSONALITY.
*THAT IS WHY THE INITIATION / SHAKTIPADA IS ALWAYS CALLED REBIRTH. THE INITIATED ONE WHO GOT THE SHAKTIPADA IS CALLED ‘DVIJA’ - REBORN.
*THE MOST ABSOLUTELY BEAUTIFUL THING THAT CAN HAPPEN TO LIFE IS, ‘CONSTANTLY DELETE THE PAST’; CONSTANTLY UPGRADE YOURSELF.
*THE MORE AND MORE YOU GET INTO A SPACE WHERE YOU CANNOT GO BACK TO YOUR PAST, THE MORE AND MORE YOU WILL FIND A HIGHER WAY AND FORM OF EXISTING.
*I HAVE SEEN SOME OF THE MOST BEAUTIFUL BEINGS IN MY LIFE FROM ALL WALKS OF LIFE; MY OWN GURU ARUNAGIRI YOGISHWARA  - AN EXTRAORDINARILY BEAUTIFUL AND GRACEFUL BEING, RAGHUPATI YOGI, RAMSURATKUMAR...
*AT LEAST ALL THESE NAMES I UTTERED ARE NOT BOUND BY CERTAIN RESPONSIBILITY IN AN ORGANISATION OR IN ORGANISED LIVING.
*BUT LIVING INSIDE THE ORGANISATION AND HAVING A VERY ORGANISED LIVING BUT VERY GRACEFUL BEINGS ALSO I HAVE SEEN -  LIKE SRIMAD SWAMI GAUTAMANANDA JI. HE IS STILL ALIVE. 
*IF YOU ARE IN CHENNAI OR TAMILNADU, NEVER MISS HAVING HIS DARSHAN. HE LIVES IN CHENNAI RAMAKRISHNA MUTT. 
*NEXT, TIRUCHI SWAMI OF KAILASH ASHRAMA. HE IS NOT IN THE BODY. HE HAS ATTAINED JEEVA SAMADHI.
*SOME OF THESE BEINGS, ESPECIALLY GAUTAMANANDA JI, I HAVE SEEN IN CLOSE QUARTERS - THE KIND OF POWER HE MANIFESTS, EXTREME POWERFUL UNDERSTANDING OF VEDANTA - THE HIGHEST TRUTHS.
*SAME WAY, KAMALATMANANDA JI. HE IS STILL ALIVE AND HE IS THE HEAD OF MADURAI RAMAKRISHNA MUTT.
*I HAD THE FORTUNE OF LEARNING AT HIS FEET. HE RADIATES THE GRACE OF SHIVA BHAKTI.
*I HAVE SEEN SUCH WONDERFUL PEOPLE IN MY LIFE WHO DEMONSTRATED, WHO PROVED, THAT CONSCIOUS SOVEREIGNTY, MANIFESTING IT AND LIVING IT IS POSSIBLE IN ALL WALKS OF LIFE.
*WHETHER YOU ARE A FREE INDIVIDUAL OR LIVING IN AN ORGANISATION OR MARRIED AND LIVING WITH A WIFE - I HAVE SEEN SO MANY GRACEFUL PEOPLE IN MY LIFE RADIATING CONSCIOUS SOVEREIGNTY.
*SOME OF THE GREATEST REVELATIONS I RECEIVED FROM MY GURU ARUNAGIRI YOGISHWARA, WHEN I STARTED IMPLEMENTING IT IN MY LIFE, AND WHEN I STARTED TEACHING, AND WHEN MY DISCIPLES INITIATED BY ME STARTED IMPLEMENTING IT IN THEIR LIFE AND GAVE ME FEEDBACK - THE RIGHT-WRONG GOOD-BAD SUCCESS-FAILURE, COMPILATION OF ALL THIS KNOWLEDGE, THE ESSENCE OF ALL THIS I AM SHARING WITH YOU ALL.
*THREE THINGS: 
*CONSCIOUS SOVEREIGNTY BRINGS NOT JUST HEALTH, BUT HEALTH FOR THE WAY YOU WANT TO LIVE YOUR LIFE.
*CONSCIOUS SOVEREIGNTY NOT JUST BRINGS FREEDOM, IT BRINGS FREEDOM WITH A PURPOSE.
READ MORE AT: https://www.facebook.com/ParamahamsaNithyananda/posts/369793354513502
